role.label: 2026 Revolving Credit Facility [Member]
role.documentation: 2026 Revolving Credit Facility

role.label: Accounts Payable, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of liabilities incurred (and for which invoices have typically been received) and payable to vendors for goods and services received that are used in an entity's business. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.terseLabel: Accrued liabilities and other current liabilities
role.label: Accrued Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of obligations incurred and payable, pertaining to costs that are statutory in nature, are incurred on contractual obligations, or accumulate over time and for which invoices have not yet been received or will not be rendered. Examples include taxes, interest, rent and utilities. Used to reflect the current portion of the liabilities (due within one year or within the normal operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Accumulated Depreciation, Depletion and Amortization, Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization for physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services.

role.label: Accumulated Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax
role.documentation: Amount, after tax, of accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transaction and other event and circumstance from nonowner source.

role.label: AOCI Attributable to Parent [Member]
role.documentation: Accumulated increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from non-owner sources, attributable to the parent. Excludes net income (loss), and accumulated changes in equity from transactions resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

role.label: Additional Paid in Capital, Common Stock
role.documentation: Value received from shareholders in common stock-related transactions that are in excess of par value or stated value and amounts received from other stock-related transactions. Includes only common stock transactions (excludes preferred stock transactions). May be called contributed capital, capital in excess of par, capital surplus, or paid-in capital.

role.label: Additional Paid-in Capital [Member]
role.documentation: Excess of issue price over par or stated value of the entity's capital stock and amounts received from other transactions involving the entity's stock or stockholders.

role.terseLabel: Adjustment to Non-PEO NEO Compensation Footnote
role.label: Adjustment to Non-PEO NEO Compensation Footnote [Text Block]
Adjustment To PEO Compensation, Footnote [Text Block]
APIC, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Increase for Cost Recognition
role.documentation: Amount of increase to additional paid-in capital (APIC) for recognition of cost for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.terseLabel: Adjustments to reconcile net income (loss) to net cash flows provided by (used in) operating activities:
role.label: Adjustments to Reconcile Net Income (Loss) to Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities [Abstract]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Change in Present Value of Accumulated Benefit for All Pension Plans Reported in Summary Compensation Table
role.label: Aggregate Change in Present Value of Accumulated Benefit for All Pension Plans Reported in Summary Compensation Table [Member]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Erroneous Compensation Not Yet Determined
role.label: Aggregate Erroneous Compensation Not Yet Determined [Text Block]
Accounts Receivable, Allowance for Credit Loss, Current
role.documentation: Amount of allowance for credit loss on accounts receivable, classified as current.

role.label: Amendment Flag
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the XBRL content amends previously-filed or accepted submission.

role.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share, Amount
role.documentation: Securities (including those issuable pursuant to contingent stock agreements) that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) or earnings per unit (EPU) in the future that were not included in the computation of diluted EPS or EPU because to do so would increase EPS or EPU amounts or decrease loss per share or unit amounts for the period presented.

role.terseLabel: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share [Line Items]
role.label: Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Asset Impairment Charges
role.documentation: Amount of write-down of assets recognized in the income statement. Includes, but is not limited to, losses from tangible assets, intangible assets and goodwill.

role.label: Assets
role.documentation: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit.

role.label: Assets, Current
role.documentation: Amount of asset recognized for present right to economic benefit, classified as current.

role.totalLabel: Total assets held for sale (net) as of May 3, 2025
role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets
role.documentation: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets [Abstract]
Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Current
role.documentation: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Australia Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Australia Segment

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Gain, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized gain in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Accumulated Gross Unrealized Loss, before Tax
role.documentation: Amount, before tax, of unrealized loss in accumulated other comprehensive income (AOCI) on investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale, Amortized Cost
role.documentation: Amortized cost of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.label: Debt Securities, Available-for-Sale
role.documentation: Amount of investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale).

role.terseLabel: Fair Value as of Grant Date
role.label: Award Grant Date Fair Value
Award Timing, How MNPI Considered [Text Block]
Award Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Awards Close in Time to MNPI Disclosures, Individual Name

role.terseLabel: Awards Close in Time to MNPI Disclosures
role.label: Awards Close in Time to MNPI Disclosures [Table]

role.terseLabel: Awards Close in Time to MNPI Disclosures, Table
role.label: Awards Close in Time to MNPI Disclosures [Table Text Block]
Bank Time Deposits [Member]
role.documentation: Certificates of deposit (CD) or savings accounts with a fixed term or understanding the customer can only withdraw by giving advanced notice with a bank or other financial institution. A CD is a short to medium-term investment available at banks and savings and loan institutions where a customer agrees to lend money to the institution for a certain amount of time and is paid a predetermined rate of interest.

role.label: Basis of Accounting, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for basis of accounting, or basis of presentation, used to prepare the financial statements (for example, US Generally Accepted Accounting Principles, Other Comprehensive Basis of Accounting, IFRS).

role.label: Canada Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Canada Segment

role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, at Carrying Value
role.documentation: Amount of currency on hand as well as demand deposits with banks or financial institutions. Includes other kinds of accounts that have the general characteristics of demand deposits. Also includes short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates. Excludes cash and cash equivalents within disposal group and discontinued operation.

role.terseLabel: Cash, Cash Equivalents and Restricted Cash
role.label: Cash and Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Entity's cash and cash equivalents accounting policy with respect to restricted balances. Restrictions may include legally restricted deposits held as compensating balances against short-term borrowing arrangements, contracts entered into with others, or company statements of intention with regard to particular deposits; however, time deposits and short-term certificates of deposit are not generally included in legally restricted deposits.

role.periodStartLabel: Cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash at beginning of period
role.periodEndLabel: Cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash at end of period
role.totalLabel: Total cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage. Excludes amount for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.totalLabel: Increase in cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; including effect from exchange rate change. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.terseLabel: Less: Net change in cash balances classified as assets held for sale
role.label: Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Period Increase (Decrease), Including Exchange Rate Effect, Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in cash, cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage, including effect from change in exchange rate, attributable to disposal group, including, but not limited to, discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposit with financial institution, and account with general characteristic of demand deposit. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investment that is both readily convertible to known amount of cash and so near maturity that it presents insignificant risk of change in value because of change in interest rate.

role.terseLabel: Cash collateral and included in restricted cash
role.label: Cash Collateral for Borrowed Securities
role.documentation: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of cash collateral held for borrowed securities, for which the cash is restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

role.label: Change in Contract Liabilities [Line Items]
role.documentation: [Line Items] for Change in Contract Liabilities [Table]

role.label: Change in Contract Liabilities [Table]
role.documentation: Change in Contract Liabilities [Table]

role.terseLabel: Change in Fair Value as of Vesting Date of Prior Year Equity Awards Vested in Covered Year
role.label: Change in Fair Value as of Vesting Date of Prior Year Equity Awards Vested in Covered Year [Member]

role.terseLabel: Year-over-Year Change in Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Prior Years That are Outstanding and Unvested
role.label: Year-over-Year Change in Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Prior Years That are Outstanding and Unvested [Member]
City Area Code
role.documentation: Area code of city

role.label: Collectibles [Member]
role.documentation: Collectibles [Member]

role.label: Commitments and Contingencies Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for commitments and contingencies.

role.label: Common Stock [Member]
role.documentation: Stock that is subordinate to all other stock of the issuer.

role.terseLabel: Class A common stock, par value (in dollars per share)
role.label: Common Stock, Par or Stated Value Per Share
role.documentation: Face amount or stated value per share of common stock.

role.terseLabel: Class A common stock, shares authorized (in shares)
role.label: Common Stock, Shares Authorized
role.documentation: The maximum number of common shares permitted to be issued by an entity's charter and bylaws.

role.terseLabel: Class A common stock, shares issued (in shares)
role.label: Common Stock, Shares, Issued
role.documentation: Total number of common shares of an entity that have been sold or granted to shareholders (includes common shares that were issued, repurchased and remain in the treasury). These shares represent capital invested by the firm's shareholders and owners, and may be all or only a portion of the number of shares authorized. Shares issued include shares outstanding and shares held in the treasury.

role.terseLabel: Class A common stock, shares outstanding (in shares)
role.label: Common Stock, Shares, Outstanding
role.documentation: Number of shares of common stock outstanding. Common stock represent the ownership interest in a corporation.

role.terseLabel: Class A common stock — $.001 par value; 1,000 shares authorized; 447.3, 306.2 and 447.0 shares issued and outstanding, respectively
role.label: Common Stock, Value, Issued
role.documentation: Aggregate par or stated value of issued nonredeemable common stock (or common stock redeemable solely at the option of the issuer). This item includes treasury stock repurchased by the entity. Note: elements for number of nonredeemable common shares, par value and other disclosure concepts are in another section within stockholders' equity.

role.terseLabel: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Company Selected Measure
role.label: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Company Selected Measure [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Net Income
role.label: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Net Income [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Other Measure
role.label: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Other Measure [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Total Shareholder Return
role.label: Compensation Actually Paid vs. Total Shareholder Return [Text Block]
Company Owned Life Insurance [Member]
role.documentation: Company Owned Life Insurance

role.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount after tax of increase (decrease) in equity from transactions and other events and circumstances from net income and other comprehensive income, attributable to parent entity. Excludes changes in equity resulting from investments by owners and distributions to owners.

role.label: Comprehensive Income (Loss), Net of Tax, Attributable to Parent [Abstract]

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Rollforward of Contract Liabilities
role.label: Contract with Customer, Contract Asset, Contract Liability, and Receivable [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of receivable, contract asset, and contract liability from contract with customer. Includes, but is not limited to, change in contract asset and contract liability.

role.terseLabel: Contract With Customer, Contract Liabilities [Roll Forward]
role.label: Contract With Customer, Contract Liabilities [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: Contract With Customer, Contract Liabilities

role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability
role.documentation: Amount of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration has been received or is receivable.

role.label: Contract With Customer, Liability, Increase (Decrease) From Other Adjustments
role.documentation: Contract With Customer, Liability, Increase (Decrease) From Other Adjustments

role.terseLabel: Revenue recognized from gift cards redeemed
role.label: Contract with Customer, Liability, Revenue Recognized
role.documentation: Amount of revenue recognized that was previously included in balance of obligation to transfer good or service to customer for which consideration from customer has been received or is due.

role.label: Convertible Debt, Issuance Increase Option
role.documentation: Convertible Debt, Issuance Increase Option

role.label: Convertible Debt [Member]
role.documentation: Borrowing which can be exchanged for a specified number of another security at the option of the issuer or the holder, for example, but not limited to, the entity's common stock.

role.label: Convertible Senior Notes Due 2030 [Member]
role.documentation: Convertible Senior Notes Due 2030

role.label: Cost of Revenue
role.documentation: The aggregate cost of goods produced and sold and services rendered during the reporting period.

role.label: Cover [Abstract]
role.documentation: Cover page.

role.label: Credit Facility [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of credit facility. Credit facilities provide capital to borrowers without the need to structure a loan for each borrowing.

role.label: Credit Facility [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of credit facility. Credit facilities provide capital to borrowers without the need to structure a loan for each borrowing.

role.label: Crypto Asset, Cost
role.documentation: Cost of crypto asset. Excludes crypto asset held for platform user.

role.label: Current Fiscal Year End Date
role.documentation: End date of current fiscal year in the format --MM-DD.

role.label: Customer Liabilities [Member]
role.documentation: Customer Liabilities [Member]

role.label: Dan Moore [Member]
role.documentation: Dan Moore

role.label: Debt Conversion Terms One [Member]
role.documentation: Debt Conversion Terms One

role.label: Debt Conversion Terms Three [Member]
role.documentation: Debt Conversion Terms Three

role.label: Debt Conversion Terms Two [Member]
role.documentation: Debt Conversion Terms Two

role.label: Debt Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for information about short-term and long-term debt arrangements, which includes amounts of borrowings under each line of credit, note payable, commercial paper issue, bonds indenture, debenture issue, own-share lending arrangements and any other contractual agreement to repay funds, and about the underlying arrangements, rationale for a classification as long-term, including repayment terms, interest rates, collateral provided, restrictions on use of assets and activities, whether or not in compliance with debt covenants, and other matters important to users of the financial statements, such as the effects of refinancing and noncompliance with debt covenants.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of debt instrument, including, but not limited to, draws against credit facilities.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Price
role.documentation: The price per share of the conversion feature embedded in the debt instrument.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Conversion Ratio
role.documentation: Ratio applied to the conversion of debt instrument into equity with equity shares divided by debt principal amount.

role.terseLabel: Aggregate percentage of holders to declare notes due and payable in default event
role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Percent Of Aggregate Principal Held To Call In Default Event
role.documentation: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Percent Of Aggregate Principal Held To Call In Default Event

role.terseLabel: Percentage of principal and accrued interest that may be called in default event
role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Percent Of Principal And Accrued Interest That May Be Called In Default Event
role.documentation: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Percent Of Principal And Accrued Interest That May Be Called In Default Event

role.terseLabel: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion [Axis]
role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion [Axis]
role.documentation: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion

role.terseLabel: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion [Domain]
role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion [Domain]
role.documentation: Debt Instrument, Convertible Terms Of Conversion [Domain]

role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Consecutive Trading Days
role.documentation: Threshold period of specified consecutive trading days within which common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instrument must exceed threshold percentage for specified number of trading days to trigger conversion feature.

role.terseLabel: Threshold percentage of stock price trigger
role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Percentage of Stock Price Trigger
role.documentation: Minimum percentage of common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments to determine eligibility of conversion.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Convertible, Threshold Trading Days
role.documentation: Threshold number of specified trading days that common stock price to conversion price of convertible debt instruments must exceed threshold percentage within a specified consecutive trading period to trigger conversion feature.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Face Amount
role.documentation: Face (par) amount of debt instrument at time of issuance.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Interest Rate, Stated Percentage
role.documentation: Contractual interest rate for funds borrowed, under the debt agreement.

role.label: Debt Instrument [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Name [Domain]
role.documentation: The name for the particular debt instrument or borrowing that distinguishes it from other debt instruments or borrowings, including draws against credit facilities.

role.label: Debt Instrument, Redemption Price, Percentage
role.documentation: Percentage price of original principal amount of debt at which debt can be redeemed by the issuer.

role.label: Schedule of Long-Term Debt Instruments [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about long-term debt instrument or arrangement.

role.label: Decrease To Contract Liabilities
role.documentation: Decrease To Contract Liabilities

role.label: Deferred Compensation Plan Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
role.documentation: Deferred Compensation Plan Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure

role.label: Deferred Credits and Other Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Carrying amount as of the balance sheet date of unearned revenue or income, not otherwise specified in the taxonomy, which is expected to be taken into income during the current period and current obligations not separately disclosed in the balance sheet (other liabilities, current).

role.label: Debt Issuance Costs, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after accumulated amortization, of debt issuance costs. Includes, but is not limited to, legal, accounting, underwriting, printing, and registration costs.

role.label: Deferred Income Tax Assets, Net
role.documentation: Amount, after allocation of valuation allowances and deferred tax liability, of deferred tax asset attributable to deductible differences and carryforwards, with jurisdictional netting.

role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Sales and Percentage of Total Net Sales by Significant Product Category
role.label: Disaggregation of Revenue [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of disaggregation of revenue into categories depicting how nature, amount, timing, and uncertainty of revenue and cash flows are affected by economic factor.

role.label: Discontinued Operations, Held-for-Sale [Member]
role.documentation: Component or group of components representing strategic shift that has or will have major effect on operation and financial result and business and nonprofit activity on acquisition and upon joint venture formation, classified as held-for-sale.

role.label: Disposal Group Classification [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by disposal group classification.

role.label: Disposal Group Classification [Domain]
role.documentation: Component or group of components disposed of, including but not limited to, disposal group held-for-sale or disposed of by sale, disposed of by means other than sale, and discontinued operations.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Accounts, Notes and Loans Receivable, Net
role.documentation: Amount classified as accounts, notes and loans receivable attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Gross
role.documentation: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Gross

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount classified as assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Cash and Cash Equivalents
role.documentation: Amount classified as cash and cash equivalents attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Impairment Loss
role.documentation: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Impairment Loss

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Inventory
role.documentation: Amount classified as inventory attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Marketable Securities, Current
role.documentation: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Marketable Securities, Current

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Lease Right Of Use Assets
role.documentation: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Operating Lease Right Of Use Assets

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Other Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount classified as other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.terseLabel: Prepaid expenses and other current assets
role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Prepaid and Other Assets
role.documentation: Amount classified as prepaid and other assets attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Property, Plant and Equipment
role.documentation: Amount classified as property, plant and equipment attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations, Assets Held For Sale Period
role.documentation: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operations, Assets Held For Sale Period

role.label: Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations, Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure related to a disposal group. Includes, but is not limited to, a discontinued operation, disposal classified as held-for-sale or disposed of by means other than sale or disposal of an individually significant component.

role.label: Document Fiscal Period Focus
role.documentation: Fiscal period values are FY, Q1, Q2, and Q3. 1st, 2nd and 3rd quarter 10-Q or 10-QT statements have value Q1, Q2, and Q3 respectively, with 10-K, 10-KT or other fiscal year statements having FY.

role.label: Document Fiscal Year Focus
role.documentation: This is focus fiscal year of the document report in YYYY format. For a 2006 annual report, which may also provide financial information from prior periods, fiscal 2006 should be given as the fiscal year focus. Example: 2006.

role.label: Document Period End Date
role.documentation: For the EDGAR submission types of Form 8-K: the date of the report, the date of the earliest event reported; for the EDGAR submission types of Form N-1A: the filing date; for all other submission types: the end of the reporting or transition period. The format of the date is YYYY-MM-DD.

role.label: Document Quarterly Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as an quarterly report.

role.label: Document Transition Report
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true only for a form used as a transition report.

role.label: Document Type
role.documentation: The type of document being provided (such as 10-K, 10-Q, 485BPOS, etc). The document type is limited to the same value as the supporting SEC submission type, or the word 'Other'.

role.terseLabel: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year
role.label: Dividends or Other Earnings Paid on Equity Awards not Otherwise Reflected in Total Compensation for Covered Year [Member]
Earnings Per Share, Basic
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period per each share of common stock or unit outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share, Diluted
role.documentation: The amount of net income (loss) for the period available to each share of common stock or common unit outstanding during the reporting period and to each share or unit that would have been outstanding assuming the issuance of common shares or units for all dilutive potential common shares or units outstanding during the reporting period.

role.label: Earnings Per Share [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for earnings per share.

role.terseLabel: Exchange rate effect on cash, cash equivalents and restricted cash
role.label: Effect of Exchange Rate on Cash, Cash Equivalents, Restricted Cash, and Restricted Cash Equivalents, Continuing Operations
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) from effect of exchange rate changes on cash and cash equivalents, and cash and cash equivalents restricted to withdrawal or usage; held in foreign currencies. Excludes amounts for disposal group and discontinued operations. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Effective Income Tax Rate Reconciliation, Percent
role.documentation: Percentage of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Option [Member]
role.documentation: Share-based payment arrangement granting right, subject to vesting and other restrictions, to purchase or sell certain number of shares at predetermined price for specified period of time.

role.label: Entity Address, Address Line One
role.documentation: Address Line 1 such as Attn, Building Name, Street Name

role.label: Entity Address, City or Town
role.documentation: Name of the City or Town

role.label: Entity Address, Postal Zip Code
role.documentation: Code for the postal or zip code

role.label: Entity Address, State or Province
role.documentation: Name of the state or province.

role.label: Entity Central Index Key
role.documentation: A unique 10-digit SEC-issued value to identify entities that have filed disclosures with the SEC. It is commonly abbreviated as CIK.

role.label: Entity Common Stock, Shares Outstanding
role.documentation: Indicate number of shares or other units outstanding of each of registrant's classes of capital or common stock or other ownership interests, if and as stated on cover of related periodic report. Where multiple classes or units exist define each class/interest by adding class of stock items such as Common Class A [Member], Common Class B [Member] or Partnership Interest [Member] onto the Instrument [Domain] of the Entity Listings, Instrument.

role.label: Entity Current Reporting Status
role.documentation: Indicate 'Yes' or 'No' whether registrants (1) have filed all reports required to be filed by Section 13 or 15(d) of the Securities Exchange Act of 1934 during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that registrants were required to file such reports), and (2) have been subject to such filing requirements for the past 90 days. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.label: Entity Emerging Growth Company
role.documentation: Indicate if registrant meets the emerging growth company criteria.

role.label: Entity File Number
role.documentation: Commission file number. The field allows up to 17 characters. The prefix may contain 1-3 digits, the sequence number may contain 1-8 digits, the optional suffix may contain 1-4 characters, and the fields are separated with a hyphen.

role.label: Entity Filer Category
role.documentation: Indicate whether the registrant is one of the following: Large Accelerated Filer, Accelerated Filer, Non-accelerated Filer. Definitions of these categories are stated in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act. This information should be based on the registrant's current or most recent filing containing the related disclosure.

role.terseLabel: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.label: Entity Incorporation, State or Country Code
role.documentation: Two-character EDGAR code representing the state or country of incorporation.

role.label: Entity Interactive Data Current
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant has submitted electronically every Interactive Data File required to be submitted pursuant to Rule 405 of Regulation S-T during the preceding 12 months (or for such shorter period that the registrant was required to submit such files).

role.label: Entity Registrant Name
role.documentation: The exact name of the entity filing the report as specified in its charter, which is required by forms filed with the SEC.

role.label: Entity Shell Company
role.documentation: Boolean flag that is true when the registrant is a shell company as defined in Rule 12b-2 of the Exchange Act.

role.label: Entity Small Business
role.documentation: Indicates that the company is a Smaller Reporting Company (SRC).

role.label: Entity Tax Identification Number
role.documentation: The Tax Identification Number (TIN), also known as an Employer Identification Number (EIN), is a unique 9-digit value assigned by the IRS.

role.terseLabel: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in Compensation Table
role.label: Equity Awards Adjustments, Excluding Value Reported in the Compensation Table [Member]

role.terseLabel: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table
role.label: Aggregate Grant Date Fair Value of Equity Award Amounts Reported in Summary Compensation Table [Member]
Equity Component [Domain]
role.documentation: Components of equity are the parts of the total Equity balance including that which is allocated to common, preferred, treasury stock, retained earnings, etc.

role.label: Equity Valuation Assumption Difference, Footnote [Text Block]
Europe Segment [Member]
role.documentation: Europe Segment

role.label: Extended Product Warranty, Term
role.documentation: Extended Product Warranty, Term

role.label: Extended Warranties [Member]
role.documentation: Extended Warranties [Member]

role.terseLabel: Fair Value, Assets and Liabilities Measured on Recurring and Nonrecurring Basis [Line Items]
role.label: Fair Value, Assets and Liabilities Measured on Recurring and Nonrecurring Basis [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Fair Value, Recurring and Nonrecurring [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about asset and liability measured at fair value on recurring and nonrecurring basis.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by level within fair value hierarchy and fair value measured at net asset value per share as practical expedient.

role.label: Measurement Frequency [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by measurement frequency.

role.label: Fair Value Disclosures [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the fair value of financial instruments (as defined), including financial assets and financial liabilities (collectively, as defined), and the measurements of those instruments as well as disclosures related to the fair value of non-financial assets and liabilities. Such disclosures about the financial instruments, assets, and liabilities would include: (1) the fair value of the required items together with their carrying amounts (as appropriate); (2) for items for which it is not practicable to estimate fair value, disclosure would include: (a) information pertinent to estimating fair value (including, carrying amount, effective interest rate, and maturity, and (b) the reasons why it is not practicable to estimate fair value; (3) significant concentrations of credit risk including: (a) information about the activity, region, or economic characteristics identifying a concentration, (b) the maximum amount of loss the entity is exposed to based on the gross fair value of the related item, (c) policy for requiring collateral or other security and information as to accessing such collateral or security, and (d) the nature and brief description of such collateral or security; (4) quantitative information about market risks and how such risks are managed; (5) for items measured on both a recurring and nonrecurring basis information regarding the inputs used to develop the fair value measurement; and (6) for items presented in the financial statement for which fair value measurement is elected: (a) information necessary to understand the reasons for the election, (b) discussion of the effect of fair value changes on earnings, (c) a description of [similar groups] items for which the election is made and the relation thereof to the balance sheet, the aggregate carrying value of items included in the balance sheet that are not eligible for the election; (7) all other required (as defined) and desired information.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 1 [Member]
role.documentation: Quoted prices in active markets for identical assets or liabilities that the reporting entity can access at the measurement date.

role.label: Fair Value, Inputs, Level 2 [Member]
role.documentation: Inputs other than quoted prices included within level 1 that are observable for an asset or liability, either directly or indirectly, including, but not limited to, quoted prices for similar assets or liabilities in active markets, or quoted prices for identical or similar assets or liabilities in inactive markets.

role.label: Measurement Frequency [Domain]
role.documentation: Measurement frequency.

role.label: Fair Value Measurement, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for fair value measurements of financial and non-financial assets, liabilities and instruments classified in shareholders' equity. Disclosures include, but are not limited to, how an entity that manages a group of financial assets and liabilities on the basis of its net exposure measures the fair value of those assets and liabilities.

role.label: Fair Value Hierarchy and NAV [Domain]
role.documentation: Categories used to prioritize the inputs to valuation techniques to measure fair value.

role.label: Fair Value, Recurring [Member]
role.documentation: Frequent fair value measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, fair value adjustment for impairment of asset, liability or equity, frequently measured at fair value.

role.label: Financial Instrument [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of financial instrument.

role.label: Fiscal Period, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for determining an entity's fiscal year or other fiscal period. This disclosure may include identification of the fiscal period end-date, the length of the fiscal period, any reporting period lag between the entity and its subsidiaries, or equity investees. If a reporting lag exists, the closing date of the entity having a different period end is generally noted, along with an explanation of the necessity for using different closing dates. Any intervening events that materially affect the entity's financial position or results of operations are generally also disclosed.

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Disqualification of Tax Benefits, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Disqualification of Tax Benefits, Amount

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Expense of Enforcement, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Expense of Enforcement, Amount

role.terseLabel: Forgone Recovery due to Violation of Home Country Law, Amount
role.label: Forgone Recovery due to Violation of Home Country Law, Amount
Forgone Recovery, Explanation of Impracticability [Text Block]

role.terseLabel: Prior Year End Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Any Prior Year that Fail to Meet Applicable Vesting Conditions During Covered Year
role.label: Prior Year End Fair Value of Equity Awards Granted in Any Prior Year that Fail to Meet Applicable Vesting Conditions During Covered Year [Member]
French Term Loans [Member]
role.documentation: French Term Loans

role.negatedNetLabel: (Gain) loss on disposal of property and equipment, net
role.label: Gain (Loss) on Disposition of Property Plant Equipment
role.documentation: Amount of gain (loss) on sale or disposal of property, plant and equipment assets, including oil and gas property and timber property.

role.label: Gift Card Trade In Credits [Member]
role.documentation: Gift Card Trade In Credits [Member]

role.label: Gross Profit
role.documentation: Aggregate revenue less cost of goods and services sold or operating expenses directly attributable to the revenue generation activity.

role.label: Hardware And Accessories [Member]
role.documentation: Hardware And Accessories

role.terseLabel: Impairment on assets held for sale
role.label: Impairment of Long-Lived Assets to be Disposed of
role.documentation: The aggregate amount of write-downs for impairments recognized during the period for long-lived assets held for abandonment, exchange or sale.

role.label: Impairment or Disposal of Long-Lived Assets, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for recognizing and measuring the impairment of long-lived assets. An entity also may disclose its accounting policy for long-lived assets to be sold. This policy excludes goodwill and intangible assets.

role.label: Income (Loss) from Continuing Operations before Income Taxes, Noncontrolling Interest
role.documentation: Amount of income (loss) from continuing operations, including income (loss) from equity method investments, before deduction of income tax expense (benefit), and income (loss) attributable to noncontrolling interest.

role.terseLabel: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Additional Disclosures by Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Line Items]
role.label: Income Statement, Balance Sheet and Additional Disclosures by Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about a disposal group. Includes, but is not limited to, a discontinued operation, disposal classified as held-for-sale or disposed of by means other than sale or disposal of an individually significant component.

role.label: Income Tax Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for income tax.

role.label: Income Tax Expense (Benefit)
role.documentation: Amount of current income tax expense (benefit) and deferred income tax expense (benefit) pertaining to continuing operations.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Accounts Payable and Accrued Liabilities
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the amounts payable to vendors for goods and services received and the amount of obligations and expenses incurred but not paid.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Inventories
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the aggregate value of all inventory held by the reporting entity, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.terseLabel: Changes in operating assets and liabilities:
role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Operating Capital [Abstract]
Increase (Decrease) in Other Noncurrent Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in noncurrent operating liabilities classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Prepaid Expense and Other Assets
role.documentation: Amount of increase (decrease) in prepaid expenses, and assets classified as other.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Receivables
role.documentation: The increase (decrease) during the reporting period in the total amount due within one year (or one operating cycle) from all parties, associated with underlying transactions that are classified as operating activities.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Operating lease right-of-use assets and lease liabilities
role.label: Increase (Decrease) In Right-Of-Use Assets and Lease Liabilities
role.documentation: Change in balances of right of use asset and liability balances attributable to amortization, remeasurement, and rent payments.

role.label: Increase (Decrease) in Stockholders' Equity [Roll Forward]
role.documentation: A roll forward is a reconciliation of a concept from the beginning of a period to the end of a period.

role.label: Increase To Contract Liabilities
role.documentation: Increase To Contract Liabilities

role.terseLabel: Dilutive effect of stock-based awards (in shares)
role.label: Incremental Common Shares Attributable to Dilutive Effect of Share-Based Payment Arrangements
role.documentation: Additional shares included in the calculation of diluted EPS as a result of the potentially dilutive effect of share based payment arrangements using the treasury stock method.

role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures [Line Items]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Adopted [Flag]

role.terseLabel: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted
role.label: Insider Trading Policies and Procedures Not Adopted [Text Block]
Interest Income (Expense), Operating
role.documentation: Amount of interest income (expense) classified as operating.

role.label: Inventory, Net
role.documentation: Amount after valuation and LIFO reserves of inventory expected to be sold, or consumed within one year or operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Investment, Policy [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for investment in financial asset.

role.label: Letters of Credit Outstanding, Amount
role.documentation: The total amount of the contingent obligation under letters of credit outstanding as of the reporting date.

role.label: Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount of liability recognized for present obligation requiring transfer or otherwise providing economic benefit to others.

role.label: Liabilities and Equity
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities and equity items, including the portion of equity attributable to noncontrolling interests, if any.

role.label: Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Total obligations incurred as part of normal operations that are expected to be paid during the following twelve months or within one business cycle, if longer.

role.label: Liabilities, Fair Value Disclosure
role.documentation: Fair value of financial and nonfinancial obligations.

role.totalLabel: Total liabilities held for sale as of May 3, 2025
role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities
role.documentation: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities [Abstract]
Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Current
role.documentation: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of within one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Disposal Group, Including Discontinued Operation, Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount classified as liabilities attributable to disposal group held for sale or disposed of, expected to be disposed of beyond one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Line of Credit Facility [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Line of Credit Facility [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about short-term and long-term contractual arrangements with lender under which borrowing can occur up to maximum amount. Includes, but is not limited to, letter of credit, standby letter of credit, and revolving credit arrangement.

role.label: Local Phone Number
role.documentation: Local phone number for entity.

role.terseLabel: Convertible notes, net of debt issuance costs
role.label: Long-Term Debt
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Current Maturities
role.documentation: Amount, after deduction of unamortized premium (discount) and debt issuance cost, of long-term debt classified as current. Excludes lease obligation.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Fair Value
role.documentation: The fair value amount of long-term debt whether such amount is presented as a separate caption or as a parenthetical disclosure. Additionally, this element may be used in connection with the fair value disclosures required in the footnote disclosures to the financial statements. The element may be used in both the balance sheet and disclosure in the same submission.

role.label: Notes Payable, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Carrying value as of the balance sheet date of notes payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer), excluding current portion.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by type of long-term debt.

role.label: Long-Term Debt, Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Type of long-term debt arrangement, such as notes, line of credit, commercial paper, asset-based financing, project financing, letter of credit financing. These are debt arrangements that originally required repayment more than twelve months after issuance or greater than the normal operating cycle of the company, if longer.

role.label: Magazine Subscriptions [Member]
role.documentation: Magazine Subscriptions [Member]

role.label: Mark Robinson [Member]
role.documentation: Mark Robinson

role.label: Marketable Securities, Current
role.documentation: Amount of investment in marketable security, classified as current.

role.label: Maximum [Member]
role.documentation: Upper limit of the provided range.

role.label: Minimum [Member]
role.documentation: Lower limit of the provided range.

role.terseLabel: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value
role.label: MNPI Disclosure Timed for Compensation Value [Flag]
Material Terms of Trading Arrangement [Text Block]

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by (used in) financing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from financing activities, including discontinued operations. Financing activity cash flows include obtaining resources from owners and providing them with a return on, and a return of, their investment; borrowing money and repaying amounts borrowed, or settling the obligation; and obtaining and paying for other resources obtained from creditors on long-term credit.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Financing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by investing activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from investing activities, including discontinued operations. Investing activity cash flows include making and collecting loans and acquiring and disposing of debt or equity instruments and property, plant, and equipment and other productive assets.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Investing Activities [Abstract]

role.totalLabel: Net cash flows provided by (used in) operating activities
role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash inflow (outflow) from operating activities, including discontinued operations. Operating activity cash flows include transactions, adjustments, and changes in value not defined as investing or financing activities.

role.label: Net Cash Provided by (Used in) Operating Activities [Abstract]
Net Income (Loss) Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: The portion of profit or loss for the period, net of income taxes, which is attributable to the parent.

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Compensation Actually Paid Amount

role.terseLabel: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
role.label: Non-PEO NEO Average Total Compensation Amount
Notes and Loans Payable
role.documentation: Including the current and noncurrent portions, carrying value as of the balance sheet date of all notes and loans payable (with maturities initially due after one year or beyond the operating cycle if longer).

role.label: Notes and Loans Payable, Current
role.documentation: Sum of the carrying values as of the balance sheet date of the portions of all long-term notes and loans payable due within one year or the operating cycle if longer.

role.terseLabel: Number of independent board of directors members on investment committee
role.label: Number Of Independent Board Of Directors Members On Investment Committee
role.documentation: Number Of Independent Board Of Directors Members On Investment Committee

role.label: Number of Operating Segments
role.documentation: Number of operating segments. An operating segment is a component of an enterprise: (a) that engages in business activities from which it may earn revenues and incur expenses (including revenues and expenses relating to transactions with other components of the same enterprise), (b) whose operating results are regularly reviewed by the enterprise's chief operating decision maker to make decisions about resources to be allocated to the segment and assess its performance, and (c) for which discrete financial information is available. An operating segment may engage in business activities for which it has yet to earn revenues, for example, start-up operations may be operating segments before earning revenues.

role.terseLabel: Number of states the entity operates
role.label: Number of States in which Entity Operates
role.documentation: The number of states the entity operates in as of the balance sheet date.

role.label: Operating Income (Loss)
role.documentation: The net result for the period of deducting operating expenses from operating revenues.

role.terseLabel: Current portion of operating lease liabilities
role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Current
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as current.

role.label: Operating Lease, Liability, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Present value of lessee's discounted obligation for lease payments from operating lease, classified as noncurrent.

role.label: Operating Lease, Right-of-Use Asset
role.documentation: Amount of lessee's right to use underlying asset under operating lease.

role.label: Organization, Consolidation, Basis of Presentation, Business Description and Accounting Policies [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for the general note to the financial statements for the reporting entity which may include, descriptions of the basis of presentation, business description, significant accounting policies, consolidations, reclassifications, new pronouncements not yet adopted and changes in accounting principles.

role.label: Other Assets, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of noncurrent assets classified as other.

role.verboseLabel: Net change in unrealized gain on available-for-sale securities
role.terseLabel: Net change in unrealized gain on available-for-sale securities
role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Available-for-Sale Securities Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount, after tax and reclassification adjustment, of gain (loss) in value of unsold investment in debt security measured at fair value with change in fair value recognized in other comprehensive income (available-for-sale), attributable to parent.

role.label: Other Comprehensive Income (Loss), Foreign Currency Transaction and Translation Adjustment, Net of Tax, Portion Attributable to Parent
role.documentation: Amount after tax and reclassification adjustments of gain (loss) on foreign currency translation adjustments, foreign currency transactions designated and effective as economic hedges of a net investment in a foreign entity and intra-entity foreign currency transactions that are of a long-term-investment nature, attributable to parent entity.

role.label: Other Depreciation and Amortization
role.documentation: Amount of expense charged against earnings to allocate the cost of tangible and intangible assets over their remaining economic lives, classified as other.

role.label: Other Liabilities, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of liabilities classified as other, due after one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.label: Other Nonoperating Income (Expense)
role.documentation: Amount of income (expense) related to nonoperating activities, classified as other.

role.label: Other Operating Activities, Cash Flow Statement
role.documentation: Other cash or noncash adjustments to reconcile net income to cash provided by (used in) operating activities that are not separately disclosed in the statement of cash flows (for example, cash received or cash paid during the current period for miscellaneous operating activities, net change during the reporting period in other assets or other liabilities).

role.label: Other Revolving Credit Facilities [Member]
role.documentation: Other Revolving Credit Facilities

role.label: Payments for (Proceeds from) Other Investing Activities
role.documentation: Amount of cash (inflow) outflow from investing activities classified as other.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Debt issuance costs from convertible debt
role.label: Payments of Debt Issuance Costs
role.documentation: The cash outflow paid to third parties in connection with debt origination, which will be amortized over the remaining maturity period of the associated long-term debt.

role.negatedTerseLabel: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement
role.label: Payment, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow to satisfy grantee's tax withholding obligation for award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Marketable Securities
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for purchase of marketable security.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Productive Assets
role.documentation: The cash outflow for purchases of and capital improvements on property, plant and equipment (capital expenditures), software, and other intangible assets.

role.label: Payments to Acquire Property, Plant, and Equipment
role.documentation: The cash outflow associated with the acquisition of long-lived, physical assets that are used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale; includes cash outflows to pay for construction of self-constructed assets.

role.terseLabel: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount
role.label: Peer Group Total Shareholder Return Amount
Platform Operator, Crypto Asset [Policy Text Block]
role.documentation: Disclosure of accounting policy for safeguarding liability and corresponding asset for crypto-asset held for platform user.

role.terseLabel: Prepaid expenses and other current assets
role.label: Prepaid Expense, Current
role.documentation: Amount of asset related to consideration paid in advance for costs that provide economic benefits within a future period of one year or the normal operating cycle, if longer.

role.negatedLabel: Prepaid income taxes and income taxes payable
role.label: Prepaid Income Taxes And Accrued Income Taxes Payable
role.documentation: The net change during the reporting period in income taxes receivable, which represents the amount due from tax authorities for refunds of overpayments or recoveries of income taxes paid, combined with the net change during the period in the amount of cash payments due to taxing authorities for taxes that are based on the reporting entity's earnings.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from issuance of convertible debt
role.label: Proceeds from Convertible Debt
role.documentation: The cash inflow from the issuance of a long-term debt instrument which can be exchanged for a specified amount of another security, typically the entity's common stock, at the option of the issuer or the holder.

role.label: Proceeds from Divestiture of Businesses
role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the amount received from the sale of a portion of the company's business, for example a segment, division, branch or other business, during the period.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds from maturities and sales of marketable securities
role.label: Proceeds from Sale and Maturity of Marketable Securities
role.documentation: The cash inflow associated with the aggregate amount received by the entity through sale or maturity of marketable securities (held-to-maturity or available-for-sale) during the period.

role.terseLabel: Proceeds, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement
role.label: Proceeds, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement
role.documentation: Proceeds, Tax Withholding, Share-Based Payment Arrangement

role.label: Product and Service [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by product and service, or group of similar products and similar services.

role.label: Product and Service [Domain]
role.documentation: Product or service, or a group of similar products or similar services.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.terseLabel: Property and equipment, net of accumulated depreciation of $572.5, $843.6 and $684.2, respectively
role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment, Net
role.documentation: Amount after accumulated depreciation, depletion and amortization of physical assets used in the normal conduct of business to produce goods and services and not intended for resale. Examples include, but are not limited to, land, buildings, machinery and equipment, office equipment, and furniture and fixtures.

role.label: Statistical Measurement [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by statistical measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, minimum, maximum, weighted average, arithmetic average, and median.

role.label: Statistical Measurement [Domain]
role.documentation: Statistical measurement. Includes, but is not limited to, minimum, maximum, weighted average, arithmetic average, and median.

role.terseLabel: Receivables, net of allowance of $0.9, $4.4 and $4.7, respectively
role.label: Receivables, Net, Current
role.documentation: The total amount due to the entity within one year of the balance sheet date (or one operating cycle, if longer) from outside sources, including trade accounts receivable, notes and loans receivable, as well as any other types of receivables, net of allowances established for the purpose of reducing such receivables to an amount that approximates their net realizable value.

role.label: Recovery of Erroneously Awarded Compensation Disclosure [Line Items]
Repayments of Debt
role.documentation: Amount of cash outflow for short-term and long-term debt. Excludes payment of lease obligation.

role.label: Restatement Does Not Require Recovery [Text Block]
Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Current
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as current. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Restricted Cash and Cash Equivalents, Noncurrent
role.documentation: Amount of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage, classified as noncurrent. Cash includes, but is not limited to, currency on hand, demand deposits with banks or financial institutions, and other accounts with general characteristics of demand deposits. Cash equivalents include, but are not limited to, short-term, highly liquid investments that are both readily convertible to known amounts of cash and so near their maturity that they present insignificant risk of changes in value because of changes in interest rates.

role.label: Restricted Stock Units (RSUs) [Member]
role.documentation: Share instrument which is convertible to stock or an equivalent amount of cash, after a specified period of time or when specified performance conditions are met.

role.label: Retained Earnings (Accumulated Deficit)
role.documentation: Amount of accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit).

role.label: Retained Earnings [Member]
role.documentation: Accumulated undistributed earnings (deficit).

role.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer, Excluding Assessed Tax
role.documentation: Amount, excluding tax collected from customer, of revenue from satisfaction of performance obligation by transferring promised good or service to customer. Tax collected from customer is tax assessed by governmental authority that is both imposed on and concurrent with specific revenue-producing transaction, including, but not limited to, sales, use, value added and excise.

role.label: Revenue from Contract with Customer [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure of revenue from contract with customer to transfer good or service and to transfer nonfinancial asset. Includes, but is not limited to, disaggregation of revenue, credit loss recognized from contract with customer, judgment and change in judgment related to contract with customer, and asset recognized from cost incurred to obtain or fulfill contract with customer. Excludes insurance and lease contracts.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Performance Obligations Associated with Subscriptions
role.label: Revenue, Remaining Performance Obligation, Expected Timing of Satisfaction [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of expected timing for satisfying remaining performance obligation.

role.label: Revenues
role.documentation: Amount of revenue recognized from goods sold, services rendered, insurance premiums, or other activities that constitute an earning process. Includes, but is not limited to, investment and interest income before deduction of interest expense when recognized as a component of revenue, and sales and trading gain (loss).

role.label: Revolving Credit Facility [Member]
role.documentation: Arrangement in which loan proceeds can continuously be obtained following repayments, but the total amount borrowed cannot exceed a specified maximum amount.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Antidilutive Securities Excluded from Computation of Earnings Per Share [Table]
role.label: Antidilutive Security, Excluded EPS Calculation [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about security that could potentially dilute basic earnings per share (EPS) in future that was not included in calculation of diluted EPS.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Reconciliation of Cash and Cash Equivalents
role.label: Schedule of Cash and Cash Equivalents [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the components of cash and cash equivalents.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Assets and Liabilities Held for Sale
role.label: Disposal Groups, Including Discontinued Operations [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of information related to a disposal group. Includes, but is not limited to, a discontinued operation, disposal classified as held-for-sale or disposed of by means other than sale or disposal of an individually significant component.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Reconciliation of Shares Used in Calculating Basic and Diluted Net Income (Loss) Per Common Share
role.label: Schedule of Earnings Per Share, Basic and Diluted [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of an entity's basic and diluted earnings per share calculations, including a reconciliation of numerators and denominators of the basic and diluted per-share computations for income from continuing operations.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Fair Value of Assets and Liabilities Measured at Fair Value on Recurring Basis
role.label: Schedule of Fair Value, Assets and Liabilities Measured on Recurring Basis [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of assets and liabilities, including [financial] instruments measured at fair value that are classified in stockholders' equity, if any, that are measured at fair value on a recurring basis. The disclosures contemplated herein include the fair value measurements at the reporting date by the level within the fair value hierarchy in which the fair value measurements in their entirety fall, segregating fair value measurements using quoted prices in active markets for identical assets (Level 1), significant other observable inputs (Level 2), and significant unobservable inputs (Level 3).

role.label: Nature of Operation, Product Information, Concentration of Risk [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about concentration risk of product within nature of operation.

role.label: Property, Plant and Equipment [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about physical assets used in the normal conduct of business and not intended for resale. Includes, but is not limited to, balances by class of assets, depreciation and depletion expense and method used, including composite depreciation, and accumulated deprecation.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Reconciliation of Restricted Cash
role.label: Restrictions on Cash and Cash Equivalents [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of cash and cash equivalents restricted as to withdrawal or usage.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table]
role.label: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about profit (loss) and total assets by reportable segment.

role.terseLabel: Schedule of Information on Segments and Reconciliation to Earnings Before Income Taxes
role.label: Schedule of Segment Reporting Information, by Segment [Table Text Block]
role.documentation: Tabular disclosure of the profit or loss and total assets for each reportable segment. An entity discloses certain information on each reportable segment if the amounts (a) are included in the measure of segment profit or loss reviewed by the chief operating decision maker or (b) are otherwise regularly provided to the chief operating decision maker, even if not included in that measure of segment profit or loss.

role.label: Title of 12(b) Security
role.documentation: Title of a 12(b) registered security.

role.label: Security Exchange Name
role.documentation: Name of the Exchange on which a security is registered.

role.label: Segments [Domain]
role.documentation: Components of an entity that engage in business activities from which they may earn revenue and incur expenses, including transactions with other components of the same entity.

role.label: Geographical [Domain]
role.documentation: Geographical area.

role.label: Segment Reporting Disclosure [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for reporting segments including data and tables. Reportable segments include those that meet any of the following quantitative thresholds a) it's reported revenue, including sales to external customers and intersegment sales or transfers is 10 percent or more of the combined revenue, internal and external, of all operating segments b) the absolute amount of its reported profit or loss is 10 percent or more of the greater, in absolute amount of 1) the combined reported profit of all operating segments that did not report a loss or 2) the combined reported loss of all operating segments that did report a loss c) its assets are 10 percent or more of the combined assets of all operating segments.

role.label: Segment Reporting Information [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Segment Reporting, Other Segment Item, Amount
role.documentation: Amount of other expense (income) and loss (gain) calculated as difference between segment revenue and separately disclosed expense category to arrive at segment profit (loss).

role.label: Selling, General and Administrative Expense
role.documentation: The aggregate total costs related to selling a firm's product and services, as well as all other general and administrative expenses. Direct selling expenses (for example, credit, warranty, and advertising) are expenses that can be directly linked to the sale of specific products. Indirect selling expenses are expenses that cannot be directly linked to the sale of specific products, for example telephone expenses, Internet, and postal charges. General and administrative expenses include salaries of non-sales personnel, rent, utilities, communication, etc.

role.label: Share-Based Payment Arrangement, Noncash Expense
role.documentation: Amount of noncash expense for share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Award Type [Domain]
role.documentation: Award under share-based payment arrangement.

role.label: Shares, Outstanding
role.documentation: Number of shares issued which are neither cancelled nor held in the treasury.

role.label: Significant Accounting Policies [Text Block]
role.documentation: The entire disclosure for all significant accounting policies of the reporting entity.

role.label: Software [Member]
role.documentation: Software

role.label: Segments [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by business segments.

role.label: Equity Components [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by component of equity.

role.label: Geographical [Axis]
role.documentation: Information by geographical components.

role.label: Statement [Line Items]
role.documentation: Line items represent financial concepts included in a table. These concepts are used to disclose reportable information associated with domain members defined in one or many axes to the table.

role.label: Statement [Table]
role.documentation: Disclosure of information about statement of comprehensive income, income, other comprehensive income, financial position, cash flows, and shareholders' equity.

role.terseLabel: Stock Price or TSR Estimation Method
role.label: Stock Price or TSR Estimation Method [Text Block]
Stock Appreciation Rights (SARs) [Member]
role.documentation: Right to receive cash or shares equal to appreciation of predetermined number of grantor's shares during predetermined time period.

role.label: Shares Issued, Shares, Share-Based Payment Arrangement, after Forfeiture
